projects.title: Latest Projects
projects.subtitle: Here you can find some of the latest projects showcasing my skills and expertise.

sushi.description: Sushi website project developed with Next.js, featuring an interactive menu, restaurant information, and an online ordering system.

imc.name: IMC Calculator
imc.description: BMI calculator project built with React, allowing users to input their weight and height to calculate and display their Body Mass Index.

nunes.description: Simple product registration system built with React, allowing users to add, edit, and view product details in an easy-to-use interface.

workout.name: Personal Trainer Management System
workout.description: A platform where students can hire personal trainers, receive customized workout plans, and access dashboards for both trainers and students.
